Webis-SDMbridge-12

  • Synopsis
  • Download
  • Research
  • People
  • Publications

Synopsis

This corpus provides the simulation data mining community with a collection of 14641 bridge models and simulated behavior.

Download

To download the corpus use the following link:

  • corpus-webis-sdmbridge-12.zip
    (60.6 MB, MD5 sum: d1c46246ba9f9ee70694ae41d31026cc)

Research

This corpus is linked with the digital engineering project. All accepted publications and related information is given there.

People

  • Steven Burrows
  • Benno Stein
  • Jörg Frochte
  • Tim Gollub

Students: Peter Hirsch, Jens Opolka, Tom Paschke, and Michael Völske.
